<!-- NestJS JavaScript Game Project - Hit the Ball with Bat -->

# Project Setup

This is a NestJS application with JavaScript for a "Hit the Ball with Bat" game, configured for cloud deployment on Render and Vercel.

## Completed Steps

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Scaffold NestJS project
- [x] Set up game logic structure
- [x] Configure for Render/Vercel deployment
- [x] Test and verify setup
- [x] Ensure documentation is complete
